title: Why did i get banned?
body:
Hey Riot,
I was wondering why I got this message because I don't know why I would have gotten this ban. And even though I'm banned, I can still login and play so I was wondering if this was a bug of some sort. The message said:

Due to the decision of the Player Behavior & Justice, your account has been suspended for 2 weeks after this game.

I really don't know why I got this ban cause I wasn't toxic and I have never been banned before. And if I did get banned can u tell me for what game(s) it's for.
Thanks.

replies.body: Strange, this account hasn't actually been banned or punished ever. It seems like a friend might have been playing a prank on you, and sent you some type of emote message. No worries though, this account is not banned/suspended, and you should be able to freely play games.
